snippet.title: New Touhou Indie Game Basic Gameplay「 東方アイスフェリー勇者記～Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy 」
snippet.description:
《東方アイスフェリー勇者記～Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy》
is a Touhou Doujin game developed by the new Doujin developer team "GAMEPULSE 遊戲脈衝", This game combines two types of [2D side scroller RPG] and [Bullet Hell]. Players need to play the popular Touhou character Crino against other Touhou characters who appear as BOSS, and beat them all to achieve the final victory.

Follow us on Twitter to keep track of our gamenews:
https://twitter.com/TouhouGamePulse

BGM used :
上海アリス幻樂団 - おてんば恋娘

原作 :
東方Project
(上海アリス幻樂団)
